255.43.112.210 / 20

1125 -> 2048 -> 2^11 -> mask: 21 = N1
708 -> 1024 -> 2^10 -> mask: 22 = N2
318 -> 512 -> 2^9 -> mask: 23 = N3


					255.43.112.210 / 20
						4096
		2048 = N1						  2048
							1024 = N2			  1024
									      512 = N3

Result:
N1 = 255.43.112.0 -> 255.43.119.255 / 21
N2 = 255.43.120.0 -> 255.43.123.255 / 22
N3 = 255.43.124.0 -> 255.43.125.255 / 23

 mask 20: 11111111 11111111 11110000 00000000
!mask 20: 00000000 00000000 00001111 11111111

-> 255.43.127.255 broadcast address
